ComicInfo.Summary:
It's just Rick and Morty. Rick and Morty and their adventures, Morty... Rick and Morty, forever and forever, FIFTY ISSUES Rick and MortyTM! Join us as we celebrate this milestone with a special, super oversized MORTY'S MINDBLOWER issue! Featuring creators from the previous 49 issues!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Marc Ellerby & Sarah Stern | 1 | B | Connecting Cover B (Left) | Matt Horak | 2 | C | Connecting Cover C (Right) | Matt Horak | 3 | RE | Oni Shopify Exclusive Variant Cover | Marc Ellerby & Sarah Stern | Missing | RE | Big Easy Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Kyle Starks & Sarah Stern | Missing | Var | Justin Roiland Variant Cover | Julieta Colas | Missing | Var | Dan Harmon Variant Cover | Julieta Colas | Missing |
